entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Severn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:26 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -20.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Severn Airport 2:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -20.2°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -22.4°C
Wind: E 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
